attributes.action: allow 12 monthly payments of council tax instead of 10,inline with salary payments.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: the current council tax payments of 10 per year are out of line with the rest of financial dealings which are done with 12 calendar month payments and cause budgeting problems for people paid monthly,i.e.finding money to pay in advance of salary.
